item.title: Tenshi no Uta: Shiroki Tsubasa no Inori for Switch launches September 18 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/tenshi-no-uta-shiroki-tsubasa-no-inori-for-switch-launches-september-18-in-japan

  • Switch

English release also planned.

Edia will release turn-based RPG Tenshi no Uta: Shiroki Tsubasa no Inori for Switch on September 18 in Japan for 3,900 yen (4,290 yen with tax), the company announced. Physical edition pre-orders are available now.

Tenshi no Uta: Shiroki Tsubasa no Inori first launched for Super Famicom on July 29, 1994 in Japan. It was also released via D4Enterprise’s Project EGG service for PC on December 19, 2018.

Edia also plans to release an English version of Tenshi no Uta: Shiroki Tsubasa no Inori, with further information to be announced at a later date.

Watch a new trailer below.

Official Trailer
